headline: Rothschild & Co Redburn Downgrades Applied Materials (AMAT) Stock to Neutral
summary: Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) is one of the Top 10 Software and Technology Stocks to Buy Now. Rothschild & Co Redburn downgraded the company’s stock to “Neutral” from “Buy” with a price objective of $200, down from the prior target of $225, as reported by The Fly. As per the firm, China’s push for semiconductor self-sufficiency tends to challenge much of the […]
